actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to permit certain post-retirement employment on the same basis as is permitted under the social security system.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to permit certain postretirement employment by rail carrier annuitants on the same basis as is permitted under the social security system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to permit certain post-retirement employment on the same basis as is permitted under the social security system.
